alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 5:55PM EST until February 05 at 2:12AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Along the Nescopeck Creek near St. Johns Road between Police Grove Road and North Old Turnpike Road in Bulter Township, Luzerne County. * WHEN...Until 1145 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying areas along the Nescopeck Creek is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 552 PM EST, Emergency management reported an ice jam near the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Johns unincorporated community in Bulter Township - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
